function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of wastewater management strategies in breeam guidance","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of unfamiliar public health measures that infringe on personal freedoms","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited availability of clinical prevalence data for direct comparisons, making it difficult to assess the model’s accuracy.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategies for encouraging physical activity during health crises like covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of statistical methods and randomization in experiments","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Services offered by construction workers can act as a potential catalyst for virus transmission, including covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between urban density and covid-19 spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing and isolation leading to uncontrolled spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time updates and dynamic content may encourage user interaction but also increase the risk of contagious disease propagation if the dashboard is accessed by infected individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor concentration on domestic hot water in hospitals and healthcare buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus quanta concentration increases with occupant density, leading to higher infection risk and more newly infected people.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid growth in wbe for monitoring infectious disease","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital channels in the built environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of statistical values","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research period for assessing efficiency of hand-washing stations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neighbourhood greenness decreasing the effect of income deprivation on mortality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of knowledge to obtain the danger model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate testing methods for covid-19 may result in the failure to identify asymptomatic or incubating individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the built environment’s impact on disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Respondents missing spending time outdoors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of responses across categories including garden usage frequency","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risks associated with increased demand for recreational activity in green spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data poverty and poor data leading to inadequate response and perpetuating inequality","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of professional certification for healthy building design among design professionals.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity in programming the monitoring platform may lead to operational errors","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability of urban big data to capture underlying cause-effect relationships","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of wet and living spaces may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of pathogens.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of car parking areas into an open space market during red level situations could lead to crowding and close contact among individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how different building functions and space types influence indoor microbiome","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate support for physical distancing in balcony designs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate predictions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of spatial homogeneity of built environment attributes may result in overlooking localized factors influencing disease spread, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to spatial distancing or isolation measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal and formal interactions among occupants in health club facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrequent cleaning and lack of contactless technologies in residential spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited studies on the influence of climate parameters on the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in multi-purpose urban gardens","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large percentage of respondents in disagreement about construction companies adjusting schedule to avoid slowdown bottleneck","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in complying with social distancing and capacity limitations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development and survival of bacteria and mold in ventilation systems and air filters.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the percentage of recovered patients required for herd immunity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe problems for newly arrived migrant and refugee children","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns about the battery life of smart wearables","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Influence of setting characteristics on biodiversity perception","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data duplication in source code repositories leading to rapid evolution and fading out of topics in software engineering","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contaminated wastewater flow to the wastewater treatment plant","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Replication studies with sars-cov-2 positive wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmitting on-site high-definition images and videos to remote command center in real-time","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Domestic violence increase","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
